entry.title: Ludwig Standard Maple 14x8‚Äù Chestnut Snare Drum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Snare Drums
Price: 280.00

$280 Ludwig Standard Maple 14x8 snare drum. Used excellent condition. Designed to be the workhorse of any collection, Ludwig has combined 6 plies of North American maple with a unique, outer veneer of aged chestnut that is as durable as it is beautiful. Warm big tone.

Add precision 45-degree bearing edges, 2.3 mm steel triple-flange hoops, 20-strand steel wires and a P85AC throw and you have the next generation of performance meets value.

Proudly handcrafted in Monroe, NC,

entry.title: Ludwig Classic Saddle Throne LAC48TH
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Drum Hardware
Price: 199.00

$199.00 Ludwig Atlas Classic drum throne, comfort is the name of the game. Thick, high-density foam prevents leg and back fatigue - especially during long performances. Height is easily adjustable, thanks to a locking spindle. Decked out in Ludwig's Classic-colored vinyl with an embroidered block logo, the Ludwig Atlas Classic drum throne looks as good as it works.

Ludwig Atlas Classic Drum Throne specs:
Saddle drum throne
Locking spindle for easy height adjustment
Classic blue/olive vinyl with embroidered Ludwig block logo

entry.title: Ludwig Supraphonic 14x6.5‚Äù Snare Drum B Stock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Snare Drum
Price: 475.00

Ludwig 14x6.5‚Äù Supraphonic B Stock. ¬†These are priced well below retail and have very small factory imperfections.¬†

Legendary Snare Crack

The performance-proven Ludwig Supraphonic snare drum can be heard on countless recordings from the 1960s through today.

Famous for its bright, crisp attack, thanks to a chrome-plated, seamless beaded aluminum shell, the snare provides you with a sublime balance of full, resonant tone and cutting snare crack. This snare can be used the on everything from jazz to metal with fantastic results. Featuring a smooth shell and elegant-looking 10 Imperial lugs, the Ludwig Supraphonic snare will make a fine addition to your drum set.

  • 1.7mm Seamless Aluminum Shell
  • 2.3mm Steel Triple Flanged Hoops
  • P88AC Throw Off
  • P35P Butt Plate
  • Ludwig Weather Master Medium Coated Head
  • Ludwig Weather Master Clear Snare Side Head
  • 10 lugs

entry.title: Ludwig NueSonic Digital Black Oyster 3pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 1299.99

$1299.99 Ludwig Digital Black Oyster NueSonic 3pc Drum Set! 22,16,13. ¬†Snare stand not included. Beautiful set and deep sound! ¬†

Elevating their sonic palette, Ludwig is proud to introduce a new line of USA drums crafted for the working professional! NeuSonic series drums by Ludwig offers yet another tonally rich option for the drummer looking for reliability and performance for every working professional setting.

They feature a cross-over shell design blending a 3-ply maple exterior with a 3-ply cherry interior. With five exciting finishes, NeuSonic captures the traditional Ludwig aesthetics coupled with a brand new sound that will compliment a wide-range of performance settings. The industry's best-in-class for price of any USA made drum set.
A 6-ply crossover shell made up of a 3-ply maple exterior and 3-ply cherry interior. Formed at Ludwig's factory in Monroe, NC USA, this shell measures at 5 mm thick for optimal resonance and sustain.
Neusonic series shells features a single 45-degree bearing edge with a 1/16" back cut. This offers wide-range tuning abilities and optimal sustain.
To increase stability throughout the drum, all Ludwig USA shells are produced using Radio Frequency Technology. Using a process involving their original bladder molds from the 1960's, R.F.S.T's unique bonding system combined with a specialized adhesive cures each shell evenly over the entire surface of the shell. This process is truly the principal iningredient to the "Ludwig Sound".
Component Features:
Bass Drum: Virgin Kick Drum, Mini-Elite Lugs, Low Mass Claw Hooks, NeuSonic Straight Spurs
Floor Tom: Triad Leg Brackets w/ Floor Tom Legs, Mini-Elite Lugs
Tom: Triad Tom Bracket, Mini-Elite Lugs w/ (1) PM0048 Tom Holder
Shell Dimensions:
Bass: 14 x 22"
Floor: 16 x 16"
Tom: 9 x 13"

entry.title: Ludwig NueSonic Skyline Blue 3pc Drum Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ludwig
Type: Sets & Kits
Price: 999.99

$999.99 Ludwig NueSonic 3pc Skyline Blue drum set! So beautiful. A USA made drum set for under $1000 has seemed impossible for many years. Ludwig has finally cracked the code with the NeuSonic Series drum sets. They feature a cross-over shell design blending a 3-ply maple exterior with a 3-ply cherry interior. NeuSonic captures the traditional Ludwig aesthetics coupled with a brand new sound that will compliment a wide-range of performance settings. This shell pack consists of a 22x16 Bass Drum, a 12x8 Tom, and a 16x16 floor tom. This is a shell pack only. Stands and cymbals are sold separately.
Hand Made at the Ludwig Factory in Monroe, North Carolina
Bears the legendary, proud Keystone Badge
